segments.text: You have 16 balls on the table , 7 solid colored , 7 striped colored , a black 8 ball , and the white ball .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You hit the white ball with your cue . The white ball hits the colored balls . And you want to get the colored balls into the pockets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you know whether you should hit the solid or the striped one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At the beginning , it does not matter , but once someone gets one ball in , it is set .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I get the black ball in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The black ball has to be the final ball in the pockets .
segments.speaker: S2
